quotes.quote: To AC is human. To AK divine.
quotes.author: Moon

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: A dream is what makes people love life even when it is painful.
quotes.author: Theodore Zeldin

quotes.quote: Don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Though nobody can go back and make a new beginning… Anyone can start over and make a new ending.
quotes.author: Chico Xavier

quotes.quote: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
quotes.author: Omar Khayyam

quotes.quote: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: All the waters of the world find one another again, and very road leads us wanderers too back home.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: Time does not pass, it continues.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Be both soft and wild. Just like the Moon. Or the storm. Or the sea.
quotes.author: Victoria Erickson

quotes.quote: Pain is a part of growing up. It is how we learn...
quotes.author: Dan Brown

quotes.quote: Beneath the winter, you can feel the bone structure of the landscape, and the whole story doesn't show.
quotes.author: Andrew Wyeth

quotes.quote: I had been educated in the rhythms of the mountain, in which change was never fundamental, only cyclical.
quotes.author: Tara Westover

quotes.quote: When you look at the stars, if feels like you are not from any particular piece of land, but from the solar system.
quotes.author: Kalpana Chawla

quotes.quote: Not all those who wander are lost.
quotes.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: What then is time? If no one asks me, I know what it is. If I wish to explain it to him who asks, I do not know.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Change your opinions, keep to your principles; change your leaves, keep intact your roots.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Patience is not simply the ability to wait, it's how we behave while we're waiting.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: A rolling stone gathers no moss, but it gains a certain polish.
quotes.author: Oliver Herford

quotes.quote: I decided to fly through the air, live in the sunlight and enjoy life as much as I could.
quotes.author: Evel Knievel

quotes.quote: Be a life long or short, its completeness depends on what it was lived for.
quotes.author: David Starr Jordan

quotes.quote: There are two ways to live: you can live as if nothing is a miracle; you can live as if everything is a miracle.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: All human wisdom is summed up in two words; wait and hope.
quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

quotes.quote: There is no happiness like this happiness: quiet mornings, light from the river, the weekend ahead.
quotes.author: James Salter

quotes.quote: A lead falls; something is flying by; Let whatever your eyes gaze upon be created, and the soul of the hearer remain shivering.
quotes.author: Vicente Huidobro

quotes.quote: Still round the corner there may wait, a new road or a secret gate.
quotes.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: One of the advantages of being disorganized is that one is always having surprising discoveries.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

quotes.quote: Every day is a journey, and the journey itself is home.
quotes.author: Matsuo Basho

quotes.quote: Life is an ongoing process of choosing between safety and risk. Make the growth choice a dozen times a day.
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.quote: A leaf fluttered in through the window, as if supported by the rays of the sun.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: All that we see or seem is but a dream within a dream.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: Let every dawn be to you as the beginning of life, and every setting sun be to you as its close.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: The softer snow falls, the longer it dwells upon, and the deeper it sinks into the mind.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: Happiness does not lie in happiness, but in the achievement of it.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: You and I are all as much continuous with the physical universe as a wave is continuous with the ocean.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: No self is an island, each exists in a fabric of relations that is more complex and mobile than ever before.
quotes.author: Jean-Francois Lyotard

quotes.quote: Sit in reverie and watch the changing color of the waves that break upon the idle seashore of the mind.
quotes.author: Henry Longfellow

quotes.quote: Water, stories, the body, all the things we do, are mediums that hid and show what's hidden.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Focus on what lights a fire inside of you and use that passion to fill a white space.
quotes.author: Kendra Scott

quotes.quote: Unlike a drop of water lost its identity when joins the ocean, man keeps his being in which he lives.
quotes.author: B. R. Ambedkar

quotes.quote: Snow isn't just pretty. It also cleanses our world, our senses, and a kind of weary familiarity.
quotes.author: John Burnside

quotes.quote: Loss is nothing else but change, and change is nature's delight.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: If there is magic on this planet, it is contained in water.
quotes.author: Loren Eiseley

quotes.quote: If the world's a veil of tears, smile till rainbows span it.
quotes.author: Lucy Larcom

quotes.quote: Any landscape is a condition of the spirit.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: Life is in a land full of thorns and weeds, there always a space in which the good seed can grow.
quotes.author: Jorge Mario Bergoglio

quotes.quote: The whole universe appears as an infinite storm of beauty.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: You traverse the world in search of happiness, which is within the reach of every man.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: We sail within a vast sphere, ever drifting in uncertainty, driven from end to end.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Nothing is poetical if the plain daylight is not poetical.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Rest is not idleness. To lie sometimes on the grass under trees, and listen to the murmur of the water.
quotes.author: John Lubbock

quotes.quote: As the sun makes ice melt, kindness causes misunderstanding, mistrust, and hostility to evaporate.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: In my search for you, I've made my new home in the eyes of a bird, staring at the passing wind.
quotes.author: Kaili Blues

quotes.quote: Your spark isn't your purpose. The last box fills in when you're ready to come live.
quotes.author: Film, Soul

quotes.quote: There's a point at which we make our lives, but we also take the path which si given to us.
quotes.author: Ali Smith

quotes.quote: Yesterday is but today's memory, and tomorrow is today's dream.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: For the wise man looks into space and he know there is no limited dimensions.
quotes.author: Zhuangzi

quotes.quote: My life is bathed in golden sunlight, and the really wonderful thing is that I know it.
quotes.author: Helen McCrory

quotes.quote: You block your dream when you allow your feat to grow bigger than you faith.
quotes.author: Mary Manin Morrissey

quotes.quote: The future influences the present just as much as the past.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: You could cover the whole earth with asphalt, but sooner or later green grass would break through.
quotes.author: Ilya Ehrenburg

quotes.quote: Empathy is about finding echoes of another person in yourself.
quotes.author: Mohsin Hamid

quotes.quote: Life is like this one big process of letting go.
quotes.author: Adrianne Lenker

quotes.quote: Great results cannot be achieved at once; and we should be satisfied to advance in life, step by step.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

quotes.quote: To live means to be aware, joyously, drunkenly, serenely, divinely aware.
quotes.author: Henry Miller
